title: It would be great if the Solr site referred to ManifoldCF as a related product
description: The "Related products" section of the Solr site has just Lucene and Nutch in it.  It would be appropriate to have a link for ManifoldCF as well.  Url would be: http://incubator.apache.org/connectors/

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: Looking at the site today, this was done at some point in the past. Apache Manifold CF is listed under Related Projects at https://lucene.apache.org/solr/index.html (and with the updated URL).
